mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.wffl AS "wffl", a.hfc AS "hfc", a.clz AS "clz", a.szjc AS "szjc"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_five_gpszy_wscl( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, wffl, hfc, clz, szjc ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{wffl}, #{hfc}, #{clz}, #{szjc} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_five_gpszy_wscl SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, wffl = #{wffl}, hfc = #{hfc}, clz = #{clz}, szjc = #{szjc} WHERE id = #{id}
